series.name: Pennyworth
series.description: Były żołnierz sił specjalnych, Alfred Pennyworth, pracuje w Londynie dla Thomasa, ojca Bruce'a Wayne'a.

series.name: Godfather of Harlem
series.description: Bumpy Johnson, szef mafii z Harlemu, po 10 latach spędzonych w więzieniu wychodzi na wolność i wypowiada wojnę włoskiej mafii, która przejęła jego terytorium.

series.name: Star Trek: Picard
series.description: W Star Trek: Picard Patrick Stewart powraca w roli Jean-Luca Picarda, którego grał przez siedem sezonów Star Trek: Pokolenia. W nowej serii zobaczymy kolejny rozdział życia tego ikonicznego bohatera.

series.name: Dorohedoro
series.description: Caiman and Nikaido both hunt for the sorcerer who made Caiman lose his memories and gave him his lizard head.

series.name: Beastars
series.description: In a school populated by anthropomorphic animals, a humble wolf with anxiety investigates a classmate's sudden murder, while contending with his bewildering feelings for a kindly dwarf rabbit.

series.name: Co robimy w ukryciu?
series.description: A look into the daily (or rather, nightly) lives of three vampires, who've lived together for over 100 years, on Staten Island.

series.name: Mandalorian
series.description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

series.name: Castlevania
series.description: A vampire hunter fights to save a besieged city from an army of otherworldly creatures controlled by Dracula.

series.name: See
series.description: Far in a dystopian future, the human race has lost the sense of sight, and society has had to find new ways to interact, build, hunt, and to survive.

series.name: Final Space
series.description: An astronaut named Gary and his planet-destroying sidekick called Mooncake embark on serialized journeys through space in order to unlock the mystery of where the universe actually ends and if it actually does exist.
